name: QueryResults
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults
description:
QueryResults is a special case Array with additional values. A QueryResults object is returned from Dataset#run and contains the Entities from the query as well as the queryâ€™s cursor and more_results value.

Please be cautious when treating the QueryResults as an Array. Many common Array methods will return a new Array instance.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
datastore = gcloud.datastore

query = datastore.query("Task")
tasks = datastore.run query

tasks.size #=> 3
tasks.cursor #=> Gcloud::Datastore::Cursor(c3VwZXJhd2Vzb21lIQ)

examples.caption: Caution, many Array methods will return a new Array instance:
examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
datastore = gcloud.datastore

query = datastore.query("Task")
tasks = datastore.run query

tasks.size #=> 3
tasks.end_cursor #=> Gcloud::Datastore::Cursor(c3VwZXJhd2Vzb21lIQ)
descriptions = tasks.map { |task| task["description"] }
descriptions.size #=> 3
descriptions.cursor #=> NoMethodError

methods.name: more_results
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#more_results
methods.description:
The state of the query after the current batch.

Expected values are:

  • :NOT_FINISHED
  • :MORE_RESULTS_AFTER_LIMIT
  • :MORE_RESULTS_AFTER_CURSOR
  • :NO_MORE_RESULTS

methods.name: not_finished?
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#not_finished?
methods.description: Convenience method for determining if the more_results value is :NOT_FINISHED

methods.name: more_after_limit?
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#more_after_limit?
methods.description: Convenience method for determining if the more_results value is :MORE_RESULTS_AFTER_LIMIT

methods.name: more_after_cursor?
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#more_after_cursor?
methods.description: Convenience method for determining if the more_results value is :MORE_RESULTS_AFTER_CURSOR

methods.name: no_more?
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#no_more?
methods.description: Convenience method for determining if the more_results value is :NO_MORE_RESULTS

methods.name: initialize
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#initialize
methods.description: Create a new QueryResults with an array of values.

methods.name: next?
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#next?
methods.description: Whether there are more results available for subsequent API calls. Tests the value of #more_results.

methods.name: next
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#next
methods.description: Retrieves the next page of results by making an API call with the value stored in #cursor if there are more results available.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
datastore = gcloud.datastore

query = datastore.query("Task")
tasks = datastore.run query

loop do
  tasks.each do |t|
    puts t["description"]
  end
  break unless tasks.next?
  tasks = tasks.next
end

methods.name: all
title: Gcloud
Datastore
Dataset
QueryResults#all
methods.description:
Retrieves all query results by repeatedly loading #next until #next? returns false. Returns the list instance for method chaining.

This method may make several API calls until all query results are retrieved. Be sure to use as narrow a search criteria as possible. Please use with caution.

examples.code:
require "gcloud"

gcloud = Gcloud.new
datastore = gcloud.datastore
query = datastore.query("Task")
all_tasks = datastore.run(query).all
